description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-45037)- Support for Custom Total and Grand Total Labels for Pivot Tables 
(CELLSNET-45156)- Synchronize the paging of the two grids
(CELLSNET-45140)- Validate updated cells only and ignore validation of other cells 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-45158)- Change of pivot data source adds additional LinkSource 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-45168)- The shape is skewed/tilted a bit with its text "1" position changed 
(CELLSNET-45163)- Text in a shape is inverted while rendering worksheet to image 
(CELLSNET-45161)- Angle of the picture in spreadsheet is slightly different  
(CELLSNET-45159)- Auto shape objects have rendered incorrectly 
(CELLSNET-45138)- PrintArea doesn't manage to transform images correctly
(CELLSNET-45136)- Boxes are rotated when excel is converted to pdf 
(CELLSNET-45182)- Resultant spreadsheet cannot be loaded in Excel without repair 
(CELLSNET-45143)- Aspose.Cells produces corrupted pivot table with report filter when saved to XLSB 
(CELLSNET-45135)- Images are overlapping while importing HTML as XLSX 
(CELLSNET-45134)- Column widths are lost while importing HTML as XLSX 
(CELLSNET-45133)- Content styling is lost while importing HTML as XLSX 
(CELLSNET-45132)- WrapText enabled in HTML is lost when saved in XLSX format 
(CELLSNET-45127)- Font style and size is changed after importing HTML as XLSX 
(CELLSNET-45115)- Refreshing the pivot table after adding some data generates corrupt excel file 
(CELLSNET-45109)- Error in Refresh of Pivot Table grouped by Date column 
(CELLSNET-45081)- Pivot Table's merge labels feature does not work 
(CELLSNET-45076)- Alignment doesn't work and text go out of the cell in Excel to HTML conversion 
(CELLSNET-45057)- Conversion of HTML to XLSX is not correct 
(CELLSNET-45040)- Some pivot field items are rendered as Date values instead of Numbers
(CELLSNET-40265)- culture of input files 
(CELLSNET-45142)- Issue with VLOOKUP function when external range is used
(CELLSNET-45150)- Impossible to expand or collapse the last rows of worksheet 
(CELLSNET-45139)- Paging is not working with two GridWebs on one page 
(CELLSNET-45137)- Grouped rows or columns have issues in GridWeb when it is run on Internet Explorer 11 
(CELLSNET-45203)- Characters are overlapping when rendering an Excel file to PDF 
(CELLSNET-45196)- Printout is garbled problem in exported XPS 
(CELLSNET-45187)- Tags should be in ascending ordered as per TrueType specification 
(CELLSNET-45169)- Warning: Maximum size for region is 262144 bytes, at SheetRender.ToImage on Mono 
(CELLSNET-45167)- SheetRender.ToImage renders the contents garbled and incomplete on Mono 
(CELLSNET-45166)- SheetRender.ToImage renders only the page header and footer on Mono 
(CELLSNET-43732)- Rendering to Emf and pasting into Word causes text overlapping in resultant PDF 
(CELLSNET-45186)- Area chart not showing on PDF export 
(CELLSNET-45178)- Axis labels are trimmed while rendering chart to image 
(CELLSNET-45177)- Axis labels are missing while rendering chart to image 
(CELLSNET-45151)- Charts loose all formatting while rendering spreadsheet to PDF 
(CELLSNET-45147)- Chart is missing while rendering spreadsheet to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44998)- Chart's data labels change after converting spreadsheet to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44984)- The Trendline in the second diagram is not rendered properly in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-41539)- Green ellipse word art/picture is wrongly rendered around the chart in the PDF 
(CELLSNET-45197)- Range.MoveTo does not move data validation and conditional formatting
(CELLSNET-45183)- The "Locked" attribute of ActiveX control (ComboBox) is not changed
(CELLSNET-45179)- Setting CodeName on XLSX file is not working fine 
(CELLSNET-45175)- Picture formatting doesn't work for xlsx files 
(CELLSNET-45174)- Print_Area range broke after DeleteRange 
(CELLSNET-45173)- Xlsx file is corrupted after saving 
(CELLSNET-45171)- Moving the range causes the inner ranges to shrink to being one cell long 
(CELLSNET-45162)- Chart is not calculated/refreshed correctly after deleting a range
(CELLSNET-45155)- Cells.InsertColumns/DeleteColumns causes #REF for the ListObject/Table 
(CELLSNET-45154)- Moving the range does not update the references on another sheet 
(CELLSNET-45145)- Cannot delete CameraTool object 
(CELLSNET-45060)- Button's font settings changed after simple load and save operation 
(CELLSNET-43722)- File error: data may have been lost, thrown by Excel while opening XLS
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-45190)- Exception occurred while calculating WORKDAY formula 
(CELLSNET-45199)- Excel to PDF - Index out of Array exception
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
